body.p: Are you still mad? You didn’t look too happy Sunday night. Just kidding dear.

Yesterday we stood around the office till 12:30. Then we drove down here. For the first hundred miles the sun shone and I slept. After that I drove and it rained. We stopped and took a few pictures of the Thousand Island bridge at Gananoque. We had supper at Cornwall. We got here about 9.00pm.
Today it has rained all the time. I got up at 7.30 had breakfast + went back to bed till 9.30. Art, my roommate is still sleeping. The time is about twenty to twelve.
Well as boring as it may be there it is. Two fellows went to Ottawa
We got the good word in the office we have to finish this job this week + be in the office next Monday morning.
If this rain keeps on I don’t know when we will finish, we might have to work over June. So I should be home this weekend, but I don’t know when.
I didn’t get on traffic either. Guess where we go next Monday. Pembroke, I think that is how you spell it. That is north of Ottawa and it is also a three week stay. I just can’t win.
Oh, how would you like to phone home + till then I should be home this weekend. But as I say I don’t know what day.
I enclosed another piece of paper for you. It should keep you occupied for
Well it is getting close to dinner and after all this work I had better eat.
So if you will look into those two things for me I’ll hope to see you on the weekend.
